query: SELECT * FROM classifier i WHERE i.type = 'INTERFACE' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM derivation d1 WHERE d1.target_id = i.id AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM method m WHERE m.classifier_id = d1.source_id AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM method m2 WHERE m2.name = m.name AND m2.classifier_id = i.id AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM methodinvocation mi WHERE mi.classifier_id = i.id AND mi.method_id = m.id))));
